Body: I noticed that quite a while ago my Sony Xperia Z2 had an update for Android 5 and I thought I should check today if it is out for my Samsung Galaxy Tab 4. I went to the update settings and saw that my current version is 4.4, and then I proceeded to check for update. According to my device it's updated to the latest version. Does anyone know when Lolipop will be launched for my device. My model 'n number is Sm-t231.
Title: No Android 5 Update for Samsung Galaxy Tab 4

history.Text: I noticed that quite a while ago my Sony Xperia Z2 had an update for Android 5 and I thought I should check today if it is out for my Samsung Galaxy Tab 4. I went to the update settings and saw that my current version is 4.4, and then I proceeded to check for update. According to my device it's updated to the latest version. Does anyone know when Lolipop will be launched for my device. My model 'n number is Sm-t231.
